answers.answer: Hun, have u talked to your Baby dr, your GYN? u said u are pregnant, right? Don't be squeezing your legs, k. But do go see your Dr. If u ar in that much discomfort for all good reasons call the Doctor..I hope u get better soon....
Im not pregnant anymore my child is 7mths, but my legs still hurt off and on, like if i walk around awhile they hurt.

question: Is there any places in Atlanta, Georgia that i can go to, and be tested to see if i have Diabetes? I realy need to know, because i realy don't know whats wrong with my legs, they hurt off and on, sometimes a burning pain, sometimes a stabing pain. But the pain stops if i squeeze my leg a little and push down, that gets the blood flowing. But it didn't start until I was pregnant. Please help! :-(
title: Diabetes...leg pains
